entries.question: How has this love been revealed?
entries.authorNote: None but the Son of God could accomplish our redemption; for only He who was in the bosom of the Father could declare Him. Only He who knew the height and depth of the love of God could make it manifest. Nothing less than this infinite sacrifice made by Christ in behalf of fallen man could express the Father's love to lost humanity. (EG White, Steps to Christ, p. 14.
